Shimmering At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.
Searing Sword While Overheated: inflict 1 Burn to target on hit, and inflict 1 Burn to attacker when hit.

A Blade Ablaze Inflict 1 Burn to target on hit, and inflict 1 Burn to attacker when hit.
Cooled Heart Takes no damage from Burn.
Sword of Embers When inflicting Burn using Combat Pages, apply +1 additional stack.
Tempered Passion Whenever the Emotion Level rises, inflict 3 Burn to all characters, including self. Gain Power by half the current Emotion Level (Rounded down)
Overheat If the character has 15 or more Burn at the start of the Scene, become Overheated, dealing more damage with attacks but becoming more vulnerable to Stagger damage.
Crackling Heart HP does not go below 60% of Max HP. When Staggered, proceeds to the next phase, change resistances, and purge all status ailments from self.
Vanished Mind When an Unspeaking Child is defeated, lose Power by the number of Unspeaking Children that have been put down so far next Scene.
Sizzling Heart HP does not go below 30% of Max HP. When Staggered, proceeds to the next phase, change resistances, and purge all status ailments from self.
Torched Heart Takes half as much damage from Burn. Starting with the Scene after it was spawned, gain 1 Strength and Endurance every Scene.
Overheat If the character has 15 or more Burn at the start of the Scene, become Overheated, dealing more damage with attacks but becoming more vulnerable to Stagger damage.
Combustion While Overheated: gain 3 Fragile each scene, and inflict 1 Burn to target on hit. Also, uses a different set of Combat Pages.
Borrowed Embers While alive, the first Offensive die allies play each engagement inflicts 1 Burn on hit. After death, allies are inflicted with 1 Burn when hit.
Supraheat If the character has 10 or more Burn at the start of the Scene, become Overheated, dealing more damage.
Scorching Desperation Every 3 Scenes: 'Scorching Desperation' is added to hand, which will be used the same Scene. >
Restraints On hit against a target with 3 or more stacks of 'Restraint', Immobilize them for the next Scene. >
